channel.title: Nonfunctional Link on Website
channel.description:
[url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=480683&postcount=1']This page[/url] no longer works as intended, it seems. You're linked to it from [url='https://www.blackmesagame.com/#download']here[/url] on the website.
Edit: Also, the donation link [url='https://www.blackmesagame.com/#soundtrack']here[/url] doesn't seem to function as it's supposed to either.

item.title: Nonfunctional Link on Website

item.description:
This page no longer works as intended, it seems. You’re linked to it from here on the website.
